page.title: 12RECREATION IN WATCHET
page.content: {FOOTBALL AND CRICKET}- In Watchet there are good Football and Cricket teams who play on Saturday on the Memorial Ground with their own club houses. In football there is a 1st, Reserve and Colts team (for boys) who play in Somerset Leagues.In cricket there is also a 1st and 2nd eleven. Other football and cricket teams play on Sunday. {MAJORETTES}- At majorettes we learn routines,spins and flips with a baton. When we are good we give a display.We wear a pink top, blue skirt, white daps, and a white hat with a pink feather. {MONOPOLY}- is a popular indoor board game for up to 6 players.The idea is to keep on buying property you land on,until the other players have no property or money left then they are out of the game.
